example.text: Title 42 expires at midnight, and the Biden administration has demonstrated they have no plan to deal with the massive surge coming across the border. That's why [[user]] is taking action today to address this crisis and secure our southern border.

January At the start of this year, I got right to work with holding our federal agencies accountable. When the Treasury Department publicly stated that Americans should expect delays in receiving their tax returns, my colleagues and I sent a bipartisan letter to Secretary Yellen urging her to take actionable steps to fix the backlog issues and get the IRS moving efficiently.

[[user]] just passed meaningful legislation to secure our southern border and reverse President Biden's open-border policies. It's past time for the administration to address this national security and humanitarian crisis and protect our communities.

How dare they act like they did something? They basically almost screwed up competition because they started subsidizing the very organizations they used to complain about and then made it so competition actually had to now compete with subsidized companies.

The Biden administration is ill-prepared to handle the coming surge at the border when Title 42 expires tomorrow. [[user]] is taking action this week to bolster border security and give Border Patrol agents the resources they need.
No more of this crap of: Let's just get rid of foreign aid or waste and fraud. It is all gone.

[[user]] just passed meaningful legislation to secure our southern border and reverse President Biden's open-border policies. It's past time for the administration to address this national security and humanitarian crisis and protect our communities.
